QuestData.Title: The Call of the Skies
QuestData.Description:
<Kua'fon turns his head toward the cliff and chirps eagerly. He spreads his tiny wings and flaps vigorously.>
It is time to leave the nest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Watch your hatchling take its first leap into the great unknown.

Objectives.Objective: Watch the hatchling take the leap
